column4: The axe is rusty and and stained with blood.

column10: You arrive in a small bedroom filled with eery shadows - and in of those shadows you see a cage. Inside that cage is an old man sleeping. His arms and legs all chained to the cage.
Second floor hall.  There is a small service elevator and stairs down.
This is the main hall.  The front door is chained blocking your escape.  There are stairs leading up.

column4: the most scrumptious and delicios looking cake you have ever seen
column10: This is the kitchen.  There are stairs leading down.

column4: These bolt cutters are rusty but should be good fo one or two more cuts
